original_text: And the king of Assyria sent the Rabshakeh from Lachish to King Hezekiah at Jerusalem, with a great army. And he stood by the conduit of the upper pool on the highway to the Washer's Field.
korean_text: 앗수르 왕이 라기스에서부터 랍사게를 예루살렘으로 보내되 대군을 거느리고 히스기야 왕에게로 가게 하매 그가 윗못 수도 곁 세탁자의 밭 큰 길에 서매

sentences.original_text: And the king of Assyria sent the Rabshakeh
from Lachish to King Hezekiah at Jerusalem
And he stood by the conduit of the upper pool
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 위쪽 못의 수도 옆에 섰고

sentences.original_text: on the highway to the Washer's Field
